SELECT id, model, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE jsdd.dict_type = 'aa_vehicle_configuration_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = ar.configuration_type ) AS configuration_type, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE jsdd.dict_type = 'aa_engine_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = ar.engine_type ) AS engine_type, engine_capacity, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE jsdd.dict_type = 'aa_gearbox_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = ar.transmission_type ) AS transmission_type, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE jsdd.dict_type = 'aa_environmental_standard' AND jsdd.dict_value = ar.exhaust_emission_standard ) AS exhaust_emission_standard, sale_conditions, trade_time, use_year, used_time, appraisal_score, new_rate, trade_number, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE jsdd.dict_type = 'aa_payment_method' AND jsdd.dict_value = ar.payment_type ) AS payment_type, trade_place, price_index, car_price, new_registration FROM aa_reference ar
model LIKE CONCAT('%',#{model},'%')
